channel.title: Portfolios on Joaquim RENARD
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Joaquim RENARD

item.title: Dungeon Monsters
item.description:
Dungeon Monster is a free to play dungeon crawler game available on iOS and Android.
In this game you collect monsters that you can get by fighting into hundreds of dungeons.

item.title: Tiny Homes
item.description: This game was made during Global Game Jam 2019. The theme was "What home is for you".

item.title: Visual experimentations
item.description: Experiences and tinkering using p5.js, C# and also

item.title: Cheesy Endeavor
item.description: This game was made during the GMTK game jam 2021 under the theme “Joined together".

item.title: A Life Well Spent Homes
item.description:
This game was made during Ludum Dare Game Jam in the Jam category. The game was made in 48h with a team of 2 people.
The theme of the Jam was “Your life is the currency”

item.title: The Last Cup Of Coffee
item.description: This game was made during the Ludum Dare Game Jam #39 under the theme “Running out of Power".

item.title: Grow Little Planet
item.description: This game was my entry for compo section of Ludum Dare 38 under the theme “Small World".

item.title: Frankentron 2000
item.description: This game was made during the "Pot-au-Jeu" Game Jam, a french Game jam, a 48h competition. The theme of the jam was “Makeing new stuff with old stuff".
